msg: HIVE-320. Fix intermittent nullpointer exception in count(DISTINCT).

author: olamy
msg: don't use the revision value if we are not in remoteTagging mode

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-2130] Add conditional validation to check that both the email address and latest committers checkbox are not blank.
According to the docs [1] this should be a <validator> and not a <field-validator> but that didn't work at all.
Currently the validation is working and it will not let you save the form without either an address or the checkbox, however the error message does not display.

author: gates
msg: PIG-704 Added ALIASES command that shows all currently defined ALIASES.  Changed semantics of DEFINE to define last used alias if no argument is given (ericg via gates).
